#text=I went to New York City on a business trip .
#text=I wanted to go to Ellis Island .
#text=I looked up the bus numbers that I would need to take to get to Ellis Island and what time they run .
#text=I got on the first bus , which took me to the destination to catch the 2nd bus which would take me directly to Battery Park where I caught the ferry to go to Ellis Island .
#text=I looked up the bus routes to return to my location in Manhattan .
#text=I took the ferry back to Battery Park where I caught the bus that took me to the connecting bus to take me back to my location in Manhattan .
#text=The bus dropped me off one block away from where I was staying .
#text=I very much enjoyed my day of sightseeing using the public bus in New York City .
